hypothesis_content.title: Bull-to-Neutral Transition Warning via SOL Momentum Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: When SOL price makes a new 30-day high while its 14-day RSI shows bearish divergence (lower high) during BULL regime, and cumulative volume delta turns negative for 2 consecutive days, the market transitions from BULL to NEUTRAL within 5-8 days, with SOL underperforming BTC by 6-12% over the next 2 weeks.
hypothesis_content.rationale: SOL as a leading altcoin often shows early exhaustion signals before broader market regime shifts. RSI divergence with negative CVD indicates distribution by large holders while retail chases new highs.
entry_conditions: 14-day RSI shows bearish divergence (price higher high, RSI lower high)
Cumulative volume delta negative for 2 consecutive days
SOL/BTC ratio > 20-day SMA but showing deceleration

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/BTC ratio declines 8% from entry OR regime transitions to NEUTRAL
exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL price makes another new high with RSI confirmation >70

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 45% of signals see SOL continue to outperform BTC or market remains in BULL regime for >10 days.
